500.title: Something went wrong.
500.message: An unexpected error has occurred. Please try again later.
500.details: If the problem persists, please contact support.

404.title: Page not found.
404.message: The page you are looking for does not exist.
404.details: If the problem persists, please contact support.

401.title: Unauthorized access.
401.message: You do not have permission to view this page.
401.details: If the problem persists, please contact support.

hero.title: Less Effort. More Results. Powered by AI.
hero.description: uFlow helps you get things done with less stress and more confidence—so you can focus on what really matters.

integrations.title: Connect Seamlessly with Your Favorite Tools
integrations.description: Connect uFlow with your favorite tools and platforms to streamline your workflow and enhance productivity.

services.subtitle: Our Features
services.title: Smart Note-Taking Powered by AI
services.description: Capture ideas, organize knowledge, and turn notes into actionable insights—all automatically, all in one place.

0.title: Instant Note Capture
0.description: Write, dictate, or paste anything and let AI instantly structure your notes so nothing gets lost.

1.title: Automatic Organization
1.description: AI categorizes, tags, and connects your notes intelligently, keeping your knowledge always easy to find.

2.title: Smart Summaries
2.description: Turn long notes into clear summaries in seconds, helping you review and understand information faster.

3.title: Actionable Insights
3.description: Extract key points, tasks, and decisions from your notes so ideas quickly turn into action.

4.title: Search That Thinks Like You
4.description: Find what you need instantly with semantic search that understands context, not just keywords.

footer.description: uFlow empowers you to get things done with less stress and more confidence — so you can focus on what really matters.
